metadata.title: CVE-2023-31081 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/media/test-drivers/vidtv/vidtv_bridge.cin the Linux kernel 6.2. There is a NULL pointer dereference invidtv_mux_stop_thread. In vidtv_stop_streaming, after dvb->mux=NULL occurs,it executes vidtv_mux_stop_thread(dvb->mux).

criterions.comment: linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
